subject: Hello dear, I have deposited t
body:
Hello dear, I have deposited the check of the whole of $1.7Millions
USD as we agreed with western union.
All you have to do now is to contact the western union
at:(
jjonh2188@gmail.com
) they will give you direction on how you will
be receiving the funds daily.
My agreement with them is 5,000 USD daily until the whole of
$1.7Millions USD is fully transferred to you.
Send him your information such as
1,Receiver name and address........
3,Country......................
2,phone number............
Email them with the above address: (

 ) or
jjonh2188@gmail.com

contact person is Ms.LORA ELIAS,
The only money to pay for the transfer

Thank you.
Mensah Sally.

subject: Re: Hello dear, I have deposited t
body:
Hello Mensah Sally,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that the process is moving along smoothly. I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message though, could you please clarify?

You mentioned contacting Western Union for directions on receiving the funds daily. Could you provide more details on how this works? 

Also, you mentioned an agreement for a certain amount daily until the whole amount is transferred. Could you specify what this total amount is?

Lastly, you mentioned a contact person named Elias and a fee for renewal of transfer fund file. Could you explain more about who Elias is and what this fee is for?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Carlos
